titleStmt.title: The doome of heretiques: or, A discovery of subtle foxes, who were tyed tayle to tayle, and crept into the Church to doe mischiefe. As it was delivered in a sermon at Wickham-Market in Suffolke, upon the fast day, being the 26 of May. 1647. / By Zeph: Smyth, minister of Gods Word. Imprimatur, Ia: Cranford, August 22. 1648.
titleStmt.author: Smyth, Zeph. (Zephaniah), fl. 1646-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Rothwell, at the Sunne and Fountaine in Pauls churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
